Text:
I got .exe file when I download, Please advise how to install it to my mac book air.
Thanks.
This is an .ISO file for burning to cdrom.
For more info on how to work with .ISO files on a Mac please see: http://osxdaily.com/2008/04/22/easily-mount-an-iso-in-mac-os-x/

... or just download one of the many other iWork torrents on this site. Seriously, the effort is appreciated, but I don't get why people keep on uploading stuff that's already on here in multiple versions.
